identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.vibe: Playful Minimalism. Sophisticated but accessible. Organized chaos.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, inputs, and UI text.

buttons.primary: bg-[#008C9E] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-[#FFD166] text-[#2D3748] rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold shadow-md hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300
buttons.outline: border-2 border-[#008C9E] text-[#008C9E] rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold hover:bg-[#008C9E] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300

cards.product: group relative bg-white rounded-3xl p-4 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 border border-gray-100 overflow-hidden
cards.feature: bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-md border-b-4 border-[#FFD166]

inputs.default: w-full rounded-xl border-gray-200 bg-gray-50 px-4 py-3 text-sm focus:border-[#008C9E] focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#008C9E]/20 transition-all outline-none

hero.alt: Happy child playing with educational puzzle

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit' via Google Fonts.
Ensure all interactive elements have a `data-testid` attribute.
Product cards must have a 'Quick Add' button that appears on hover.
Navigation bar must be sticky with a glassmorphism effect (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80).
Footer must be spacious (py-20) with a playful layout.
implementation_steps: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install @fontsource/outfit @fontsource/dm-sans lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge`
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` to include the new colors and font families.
3. Create a `Layout` component that wraps the app with the Navbar and Footer.
4. Build the `Hero` section using the asymmetrical layout and the hero image.
5. Build the `ProductCard` component with the hover effects.
6. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the Categories section.
